title: Italy by Bus
description: This book documents our trip to Italy in the summer of 2001. Before the trip, Italy was not high on our list of destinations. Once the trip was through, we didn't want to leave. There are lots of photos as well as some good and interesting information about Italy, including: Rome, Sorrento, Capri, Pompeii, Assisi, Furlo, Ravenna, Venice, Burano, Verona, Milan, the Italian Lakes, Pisa, Florence, Siena and Tivoli as well as Lugano, Switzerland.
author: Lee Briggs
